import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Tabs from './Tabs'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; //import $ from './../../../node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min'; //for bootstrap.min.js //bootstrap-theme file for bootstrap 3 only // import './../../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; // import './../../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min'; import {acInsertProductsRequest} from './../../actions/index'; import Alert from './Alert' //window.$ = window.jQuery = require('./../../query'); class Content extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { id : '', name : '', onTapRoom : 'hide-modal', onTapTable : 'hide-modal', } } submit = ()=>{ var parseJson = { id : this.state.id, value : this.state.name, }; this.props.onInsertProduct(parseJson); console.log('heheeeeeee') this.closeTapfuntion(); } // console.log(this.props.history.match.params.id); onChange = (event) =>{ var target = event.target; var name = target.name; var value = target.value; this.setState({ [name] : value }) } // componentDidMount(){ // window.$('.alert-position').hide(); // } onTapfuntion = () =>{ this.setState({onTapRoom : 'modal fade show-modal', // onTapTable : 'hide-modal' }) } closeTapfuntion = () =>{ this.setState({onTapRoom : 'hide-modal', // onTapTable : 'hide-modal' }) } render() { console.log('da vao content roi nha'); return (
